message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this unique product. Given its exceptional value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a starting price of $1,600,000. I'm open to discussing this further, but I believe this price reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
